title: Enhancing System Design Practical Competencies: Leadership Development and Organizational Learning Practical Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Organizational Operations and Collaboration Experience, Mathematical Problem-Solving Skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more ethical decision-making strategies utilizing political skills
Learners can execute collaborative approaches that foster psychological safety in simulation environments two or more times
Learners apply conflict management procedures between stakeholders when performing leadership role-playing in mathematics education settings
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
